content.raw:
Some notes about **libcurl** on windows. To compile ([instructions for windows](https://github.com/bagder/curl)):

 * Get the sources from [the official github](https://github.com/bagder/curl)
 * Run buildconf.bat (not in the instructions)
 * cd winbuld/ && `make /f Makefile.vc mode=static VC=12 MACHINE=x64 Debug=no  ENABLE_WINSSL=yes`
 * Results are in $curl_root/builds/
 * Remember to add the flag `-DCURL_STATICLIB` preprocessor flag in Gazebo or you will find problems when linking with `_imp_curl_*` symbols.

I recently discover a [fork for curl on Windows](https://github.com/peters/curl-for-windows), which handles all external libraries (openssh, openssl, ...) and even have binaries ready. I have yet pending to give it a try.

At this moment, we have compiled:

 * gazebo_math
 * gazebo_common
